name: Amort Music Bot
description: amort music allow you to stream music trought the telegram voice chat feature.

SESSION_NAME.description: fill with the pyrogram session string

BOT_TOKEN.description: fill with your bot token from @BotFather

BOT_NAME.description: fill with your music bot name.

OWNER_ID.description: fill with your telegram id as the owner of the bot

DATABASE_URL.description: fill with the mongodb url you get from cloud.mongodb.com

LOG_CHANNEL.description: create a private channel and get the channel id (give the channel username/link to bot @username_to_id_bot and get the channel id), add your bot as admin to the channel too

BOT_USERNAME.description: fill with your bot username without @

ASSISTANT_NAME.description: fill with the assistant username without @

BG_IMAGE.description: fill with your costum background image link

OWNER_NAME.description: fill with your telegram username without @

ALIVE_NAME.description: fill with the nickname of your telegram account

SUDO_USERS.description: fill with the user id who can access all function in your bot (separate with space).

DURATION_LIMIT.description: max duration for music to download (in minutes, default is 40).

UPDATES_CHANNEL.description: if you have channel, fill the channel username here without @

GROUP_SUPPORT.description: if you have group, fill the group username here without @
